name: Fallensteel
description:
⁞⁞ Asymmetrical PvP PC game ⁞⁞ 4+1 versus 4+1 players

⁞⁞ Fallen Steel is a graduating project. It was developped in 9 months by 7 students and some external help. Made with Unreal Engine.

⁞⁞ Developped by Anthony Carles, Hadrien Channac, Florent Costa, Adriel Beaver, Léo Gimenez-Frontin, Luc Leture, Antoine Marquès

⁞⁞ 4v4 commandos - with TPS mecanics - have to infiltrate a city. The 2 other players control a drone - with a tactical top view & RTS controls. Local multiplayer only - online multiplayer to come.

⁞⁞ Fallen Steel runs on Windows. It is designed for 10 players (4+1 versus 4+1) but can be played with by less players.


Additional propsing:
Victor Anus, Grégoire Eymon, Romain Pommier, Ryu Murakami

Animations:
Kubold's Rifle Animset Pro
